listitem.para: Set the delay (in time units, defaults to seconds) between IKEv1's Dead Peer Detection or IKEv2's Liveness keepalives that are sent for this connection. Set to enable checking.
The default value is 0 meaning disabled.
If dpddelay is set, you might need to adjust retransmit-timeout for IKEv2 and you must set dpdtimeout for IKEv1.
